showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:51}); // {Barret}
What the hell was up with
{Cloud} anyway?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:52}); // {Cait Sith}
He was a Sephiroth-clone
created by Hojo.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:54}); // {Cait Sith}
Well he wasn't made from scratch.{PAUSE}They implanted Jenova cells
into a normal human being
and then infused it with Mako energy.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:55}); // {Red XIII}
Well then, what is {Cloud}?

ops.raw: a5 00 00 12 fe ba f0 d7 fc 0c 00

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // {Cloud}
“No, it's just that you're always
so cool to what is happening
I thought you didn't care.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:38}); // {Cloud}
“This is our last battle.”{PAUSE}“Our target is the North Cave.
Our enemy is…Sephiroth!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:40}); // {Cloud}
“We're almost to the North Cave!
We're on our way, Sephiroth!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:29}); // {Cloud}
“…{Aeris}.”{PAUSE}“She was smiling to the end.”{PAUSE}“We can't just let it end with that
smile, we have to do something.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:30}); // {Cloud}
“Let's all go together.”{PAUSE}“Memories of {Aeris}…”{PAUSE}“Although she should've returned
to the Planet by now,
something stopped her and now she's stuck…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:31}); // {Cloud}
“We've got to let go of
{Aeris}'s memory.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // {Tifa}
“Why didn't you tell me!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // {Barret}
“O, oh…is that okay with you?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:18}); // {Barret}
“She ain't gonna show up.”{PAUSE}“'Least this time she didn't
steal our Materia.
Thank god for that.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:13}); // {Barret}
“Well looky-here.
The Shinra Manager's come back.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:26}); // {Barret}
“We didn't come back for your
spikey-headed ass!”{PAUSE}“I came back for Marlene.
Guess it's jus' my…
feelings or somethin'.”{PAUSE}“I, uh
I ain't got no words now…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:27}); // {Red XIII}
“…Although she's not here,
she left us a window of opportunity…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:19}); // {Yuffie}
“How could you say that!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:20}); // {Yuffie}
“After I came this far with you,
even with my airsickness!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // {Yuffie}
“I didn't go through all that
just to have you guys
have the best parts all to yourselves!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:23}); // {Yuffie}
“Gee, {Cloud}…that's so nice of you
to say that…You sick or somethin'?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:24}); // {Yuffie}
“Well, whatever. I'm gonna be in my
reserved seat in the hall…
waiting…upp…Urk!”
fade({r:128, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:2, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:1, adjust:255});
fade({r:128, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:2, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:1, adjust:255});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // {Cait Sith}
“Uh, excuse me but…”{PAUSE}“I wanted to come with the main group,
but I couldn't get away…”{PAUSE}“So some people in Midgar took me in.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:15}); // {Cait Sith}
“I know I have a stuffed animal body,
but I'll work really hard!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:10}); // {Vincent}
“Why such a puzzled look?”{PAUSE}“Don't you want me to come?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // {Vincent}
“Cool?”{PAUSE}“Hmm…
I guess that's just how I am, sorry.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // {Cid}
“Hey, {Red XIII}.”{PAUSE}“If you butt in now, you never know
what they'll say later…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:32}); // {Cid}
“Has anyone here changed their mind?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:34}); // {Cid}
“Yeah, yeah…”{PAUSE}“These two levers have been
buggin' me for a while…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:35}); // {Cid}
“Let me try them out.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:37}); // {Cid}
“All right, so what should I do?”{PAUSE}“You decide, {Cloud}.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:43}); // {Cid}
“Errrrggh!
Some incredible force!
Losing…control…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:47}); // {Cid}
“Get the hell outta here, flunkies!
Didn't I tell you all to go home!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:49}); // {Cid}
“Oh ma--…stop trying to act so cool.”{PAUSE}“All right, you jokers!
Hold me down with everything you got!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:49}); // {Cid}
“Oh ma--…stop trying to act so cool.”{PAUSE}“All right, you jokers!
Hold me down with everything you got!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:41}); // {Cid}
“Man, I'm going to stick it to him!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:28}); // {Cid}
“We can't let it go like this.”

ops.raw: a5 00 00 fa fe 6f f0 d7 fc 06 00

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:48}); // “Yes, sir. But,
this is our home!!”

dialogStrings:
Anyway, I'm heading for the World Map.
Go.
Don't go.

{Cloud}
“{Barret}! {Cid}!”

{Barret}
“O, oh…is that okay with you?”

{Cloud}
“{Red XIII}!”

{Tifa}
“Why didn't you tell me!?”

{Red XIII}
“But, you know, {Cid}.”

{Cid}
“Hey, {Red XIII}.”{PAUSE}“If you butt in now, you never know
what they'll say later…”

{Tifa}
“…Were you watching?”

{Tifa}
“…Were you listening?”

{Cloud}
“{Vincent}!”

{Vincent}
“Why such a puzzled look?”{PAUSE}“Don't you want me to come?”

{Cloud}
“No, it's just that you're always
so cool to what is happening
I thought you didn't care.”

{Vincent}
“Cool?”{PAUSE}“Hmm…
I guess that's just how I am, sorry.”

{Barret}
“Well looky-here.
The Shinra Manager's come back.”

{Cait Sith}
“Uh, excuse me but…”{PAUSE}“I wanted to come with the main group,
but I couldn't get away…”{PAUSE}“So some people in Midgar took me in.”

{Cait Sith}
“I know I have a stuffed animal body,
but I'll work really hard!”

{Barret}
“I guess that's everyone.”

{Red XIII}
“No, {Yuffie}'s missing.”

{Barret}
“She ain't gonna show up.”{PAUSE}“'Least this time she didn't
steal our Materia.
Thank god for that.”

{Yuffie}
“How could you say that!?”

{Yuffie}
“After I came this far with you,
even with my airsickness!”

{Yuffie}
“I didn't go through all that
just to have you guys
have the best parts all to yourselves!”

{Cloud}
“Welcome back, {Yuffie}.”

{Yuffie}
“Gee, {Cloud}…that's so nice of you
to say that…You sick or somethin'?”

{Yuffie}
“Well, whatever. I'm gonna be in my
reserved seat in the hall…
waiting…upp…Urk!”

{Cloud}
“Thanks everyone.”

{Barret}
“We didn't come back for your
spikey-headed ass!”{PAUSE}“I came back for Marlene.
Guess it's jus' my…
feelings or somethin'.”{PAUSE}“I, uh
I ain't got no words now…”

{Red XIII}
“…Although she's not here,
she left us a window of opportunity…”

{Cid}
“We can't let it go like this.”

{Cloud}
“…{Aeris}.”{PAUSE}“She was smiling to the end.”{PAUSE}“We can't just let it end with that
smile, we have to do something.”

{Cloud}
“Let's all go together.”{PAUSE}“Memories of {Aeris}…”{PAUSE}“Although she should've returned
to the Planet by now,
something stopped her and now she's stuck…”

{Cloud}
“We've got to let go of
{Aeris}'s memory.”

{Cid}
“Has anyone here changed their mind?”

{Cloud}
“I'm counting on you, {Cid}.”

{Cid}
“Yeah, yeah…”{PAUSE}“These two levers have been
buggin' me for a while…”

{Cid}
“Let me try them out.”

{Cloud}
“Do whatever you have to.”

{Cid}
“All right, so what should I do?”{PAUSE}“You decide, {Cloud}.”

{Cloud}
“This is our last battle.”{PAUSE}“Our target is the North Cave.
Our enemy is…Sephiroth!”

{Cloud}
“So let's move out!”

{Cloud}
“We're almost to the North Cave!
We're on our way, Sephiroth!”

{Cid}
“Man, I'm going to stick it to him!”

{Cloud}
“What is it, {Cid}?”

{Cid}
“Errrrggh!
Some incredible force!
Losing…control…”
“Captain”
“Here, sir!”

{Cid}
“Get the hell outta here, flunkies!
Didn't I tell you all to go home!?”

“Yes, sir. But,
this is our home!!”

{Cid}
“Oh ma--…stop trying to act so cool.”{PAUSE}“All right, you jokers!
Hold me down with everything you got!!”

{Cid}
“Geronimo!!”

{Barret}
What the hell was up with
{Cloud} anyway?

{Cait Sith}
He was a Sephiroth-clone
created by Hojo.

{Cid}
They really make those?

{Cait Sith}
Well he wasn't made from scratch.{PAUSE}They implanted Jenova cells
into a normal human being
and then infused it with Mako energy.

{Red XIII}
Well then, what is {Cloud}?

{Red XIII}
But why only {Cloud}?
